name: The Sanguine Art
description: Master blood magic through sacrifice, vitality manipulation, and bloodline awakening.
lore:
Blood is life. This simple truth underlies all blood magic. Every drop
contains vitality, power, essence - the fundamental force that separates the
living from the dead. And what contains power can be used for power.

The path begins with self-sacrifice. Your own blood is the safest source -
honest magic, where your pain fuels your power. Cut your palm, speak the words,
and reality bends to your will. It hurts, yes. It weakens you, yes. But there's
no corruption in using what's yours.

But blood magic doesn't stop at self-sacrifice. You can use others' blood -
given willingly or taken by force. You can awaken dormant bloodline powers
sleeping in your ancestry. You can manipulate blood physically, boiling it in
enemies' veins or shaping it into weapons. You can create blood bonds, magical
connections that let you share life force or even die for another.

The darkest techniques involve stealing life itself - draining vitality from
others to fuel your own existence, controlling people through their blood like
puppets, or even achieving immortality through blood phylacteries.

The greatest blood mages achieve apotheosis - transforming into living blood
itself. No fixed form, no mortal weakness, existing as pure animated life force.
Neither alive nor dead, but eternal.

But remember: every use of blood magic leaves a mark. The more you sacrifice,
the more you change. And some sacrifices can never be undone.

nodes.name: Blood Awareness
nodes.description: Learn to sense the life force in blood

effects.description: Sense blood and vitality in living things

nodes.lore:
Blood is life. Every drop contains vitality, power, essence. You learn
to feel it - the pulse of life in yourself and others. The stronger the
life force, the brighter it shines to your senses.

nodes.name: Self-Sacrifice
nodes.description: Learn to use your own blood as magical fuel

effects.description: Use your own blood to fuel magic

unlockConditions.description: Must be taught by a blood mage

nodes.lore:
The first lesson: your own blood is the safest source. Cut your palm,
speak the words, and your blood becomes power. It hurts, yes. It weakens
you, yes. But it's honest magic - no debt to others, no corruption of
innocents. Just your pain for your power.

nodes.name: Pain Mastery
nodes.description: Learn to tolerate the pain of sacrifice

effects.description: Reduce health cost of blood magic by X%

nodes.lore:
Blood magic hurts. Every time. But pain is just sensation - you can learn
to endure it, to function through it, even to use it. Master pain and you
master blood magic.

nodes.name: Wound Sealing
nodes.description: Learn to seal wounds instantly with blood magic
nodes.lore:
After sacrifice comes sealing. Speak the word and your blood crystallizes,
sealing the wound, stopping the bleeding. You'll still need time to heal,
but at least you won't bleed out in the middle of a ritual.

nodes.name: Bloodline Awakening
nodes.description: Awaken the powers sleeping in your blood
nodes.lore:
Your ancestors' power flows in your veins - dormant, waiting. Through
ritual and sacrifice, you can awaken it. Dragon blood grants scales and
fire. Fae blood grants beauty and illusion. What does yours hold?

nodes.name: Bloodline Refinement
nodes.description: Strengthen your bloodline beyond natural limits
nodes.lore:
Your blood can be refined, concentrated, purified. Through careful ritual
and the blood of those who share your heritage, you can strengthen the
bloodline beyond what inheritance gave you. Become more than your ancestors.

nodes.name: Bloodline Theft
nodes.description: Learn to steal others' bloodline powers
nodes.lore:
The darkest use of bloodline magic: taking the heritage of another. Drink
their blood in ritual, and their powers become yours. Dragon fire, fae
charm, demonic strength - all can be stolen. But this is corruption of
the deepest kind.

nodes.name: Blood Shaping
nodes.description: Learn to control and shape blood
nodes.lore:
Blood obeys you. Make it flow uphill. Freeze it into weapons. Boil enemies'
blood in their veins. This is hemomancy - direct control over blood itself.
Terrifying and effective.

nodes.name: Blood Scrying
nodes.description: Use blood to scry and see distant places

effects.description: Scry using blood as a focus

nodes.lore:
A drop of someone's blood is a connection to them. Use it as a focus and
you can see through their eyes, feel what they feel, know where they are.
The more blood, the clearer the connection.

nodes.name: Blood Tracking
nodes.description: Track prey through blood traces
nodes.lore:
Every wound leaves blood. Every blood drop is a beacon. You can follow
these traces across vast distances, sensing the life force that shed them.
Hunters find this invaluable.

nodes.name: Blood Curses
nodes.description: Learn to curse others through blood connection
nodes.lore:
With their blood, you can afflict them. Sickness, weakness, pain, misfortune.
The curse flows through the blood connection, inevitable and inescapable.
This is why blood mages are feared.

nodes.name: Blood Bonds
nodes.description: Create bonds by mixing blood

effects.description: Create magical bonds through shared blood

nodes.lore:
Mix your blood with another's in ritual, and you become bonded. You feel
what they feel. You know when they're in danger. You can lend them strength
or share their pain. This is how blood pacts are sealed.

nodes.name: Life Sharing
nodes.description: Share vitality through blood bonds

effects.description: Share life force through blood bonds

nodes.lore:
Through a blood bond, you can transfer life force. Heal them by giving
your vitality. Take their injuries upon yourself. Die for them, if necessary,
your life flowing into theirs. This is the deepest sacrifice.

nodes.name: Bond Severing
nodes.description: Learn to sever blood bonds
nodes.lore:
Blood bonds are permanent - unless you know how to break them. Ritual,
sacrifice, and willpower can sever even the strongest bond. This frees
you but leaves a scar on the soul.

nodes.name: Blood Regeneration
nodes.description: Regenerate wounds using blood magic
nodes.lore:
Your blood can heal you faster than natural. Accelerate healing, close
wounds, regrow tissue. Costs blood to fuel blood, but in emergencies this
can save your life.

nodes.name: Life Extension
nodes.description: Extend your lifespan through blood magic
nodes.lore:
Blood is life, and with enough blood, life can be extended. Age slower.
Resist disease. Recover from what should be mortal wounds. This doesn't
grant true immortality - but centuries instead of decades.

nodes.name: Life Drain
nodes.description: Drain life force from living creatures
nodes.lore:
Touch them and pull their vitality into yourself. Their wounds become your
healing. Their strength becomes your strength. This is vampiric magic -
sustaining yourself by draining others.

nodes.name: Life Transfusion
nodes.description: Transfer your vitality to heal others
nodes.lore:
The opposite of draining: give your life force to another. Heal their
wounds with your blood. Restore their strength with your vitality. Die
so they might live. This is the healer's sacrifice.

nodes.name: Blood Puppetry
nodes.description: Control others' bodies through their blood
nodes.lore:
With enough of their blood, you can control them - force them to move,
speak, act against their will. Their blood becomes puppet strings. This
is abomination - violating free will through blood magic.

nodes.name: Blood Resurrection
nodes.description: Resurrect through prepared blood phylacteries
nodes.lore:
The ultimate blood magic: defeat death itself. Store your life essence in
blood phylacteries - vials of your blood preserved through ritual. When
you die, your soul flows into the nearest phylactery and regenerates a
new body. True immortality - at a terrible price.

nodes.name: Sanguine Apotheosis
nodes.description: Achieve apotheosis - become living blood
nodes.lore:
The pinnacle of blood magic: transform your entire being into animated
blood. No fixed form, no mortal weakness. Flow through cracks, reform from
drops, exist as pure life force. You become blood incarnate - neither fully
alive nor dead, but eternal.

xpSources.description: Heal a wound with blood magic
Return from death via blood resurrection
